verses.verse: Let us <S%G5399><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> fear <S%G5399><s%> <S%G5680><s%>, lest <S%G3379><s%>, a promise <S%G1860><s%> being left <S%G2641><s%> <S%G5746><s%> us of entering <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5629><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> rest <S%G2663><s%>, any <S%G5100><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> should seem <S%G1380><s%> <S%G5725><s%> to come short of it <S%G5302><s%> <S%G5760><s%>.

For <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1063><s%> unto us was <S%G2070><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the gospel preached <S%G2097><s%> <S%G5772><s%>, as well as <S%G2509><s%> unto them <S%G2548><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> preached <S%G189><s%> did <S%G5623><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> profit <S%G5623><s%> <S%G5656><s%> them <S%G1565><s%>, not <S%G3361><s%> being mixed <S%G4786><s%> <S%G5772><s%> with faith <S%G4102><s%> in them that heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5660><s%> it.

For <S%G1063><s%> we which <S%G3588><s%> have believed <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5660><s%> do enter <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5736><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> rest <S%G2663><s%>, as <S%G2531><s%> he said <S%G2046><s%> <S%G5758><s%>, As <S%G5613><s%> I have sworn <S%G3660><s%> <S%G5656><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> wrath <S%G3709><s%>, if <S%G1487><s%> they shall enter <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5695><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> rest <S%G2663><s%>: although <S%G2543><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> were finished <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5679><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> he spake <S%G2046><s%> <S%G5758><s%> in a certain place <S%G4225><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> the seventh <S%G1442><s%> day on this wise <S%G3779><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> did rest <S%G2664><s%> <S%G5656><s%> the seventh <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1442><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> from <S%G575><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> his <S%G846><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> place again <S%G3825><s%>, If <S%G1487><s%> they shall enter <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5695><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> rest <S%G2663><s%>.

Seeing <S%G1893><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> it remaineth <S%G620><s%> <S%G5743><s%> that some <S%G5100><s%> must enter <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5629><s%> therein <S%G1519><s%> <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they to whom it was first <S%G4386><s%> preached <S%G2097><s%> <S%G5685><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> in <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5627><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of unbelief <S%G543><s%>:

Again <S%G3825><s%>, he limiteth <S%G3724><s%> <S%G5719><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> David <S%G1138><s%>, To day <S%G4594><s%>, after <S%G3326><s%> so long <S%G5118><s%> a time <S%G5550><s%>; as <S%G2531><s%> it is said <S%G2046><s%> <S%G5769><s%>, To day <S%G4594><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> ye will hear <S%G191><s%> <S%G5661><s%> his <S%G846><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%>, harden <S%G4645><s%> <S%G5725><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> had given <S%G2664><s%> them <S%G846><s%> rest <S%G2664><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, then would he <S%G302><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> afterward <S%G3326><s%> <S%G5023><s%> have spoken <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5707><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> another <S%G243><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>.
There remaineth <S%G620><s%> <S%G5743><s%> therefore <S%G686><s%> a rest <S%G4520><s%> to the people <S%G2992><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> he that is entered <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5631><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> rest <S%G2663><s%>, he <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> hath ceased <S%G2664><s%> <S%G5656><s%> from <S%G575><s%> his own <S%G846><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>, as <S%G5618><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> did from <S%G575><s%> his <S%G2398><s%>.

Let us labour <S%G4704><s%> <S%G5661><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5629><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> rest <S%G2663><s%>, lest <S%G3363><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> fall <S%G4098><s%> <S%G5632><s%> after <S%G1722><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> example <S%G5262><s%> of unbelief <S%G543><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> is quick <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> powerful <S%G1756><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> sharper <S%G5114><s%> than <S%G5228><s%> any <S%G3956><s%> twoedged <S%G1366><s%> sword <S%G3162><s%>, piercing <S%G1338><s%> <S%G5740><s%> even to <S%G891><s%> the dividing asunder <S%G3311><s%> of soul <S%G5590><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> <S%G2532><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> <S%G2532><s%> of the joints <S%G719><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> marrow <S%G3452><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> is a discerner <S%G2924><s%> of the thoughts <S%G1761><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> intents <S%G1771><s%> of the heart <S%G2588><s%>.

Neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> is there <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> any creature <S%G2937><s%> that is not manifest <S%G852><s%> in his <S%G846><s%> sight <S%G1799><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> are naked <S%G1131><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> opened <S%G5136><s%> <S%G5772><s%> unto the eyes <S%G3788><s%> of him <S%G846><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G2254><s%> to do <S%G3056><s%>.

Seeing <S%G2192><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> that we have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> Kohen HaGodol <S%G749><s%>, that is passed into <S%G1330><s%> <S%G5756><s%> the heavens <S%G3772><s%>, Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, let us hold fast <S%G2902><s%> <S%G5725><s%> our profession <S%G3671><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> an Kohen HaGodol <S%G749><s%> which cannot <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5740><s%> be touched with the feeling <S%G4834><s%> <S%G5658><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> infirmities <S%G769><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> was <S%G3985><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> all points <S%G3956><s%> tempted <S%G3985><s%> <S%G5772><s%> <S%G5625><s%> <S%G3987><s%> <S%G5772><s%> like <S%G2596><s%> as <S%G3665><s%> we are, yet without <S%G5565><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>.

Let us <S%G4334><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> come <S%G4334><s%> <S%G5741><s%> boldly <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3954><s%> unto the throne <S%G2362><s%> of grace <S%G5485><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> we may obtain <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5632><s%> mercy <S%G1656><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> find <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5632><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> to help <S%G996><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> time of need <S%G2121><s%>.
